comments:
Description:
NPE when preview attached xtab.
Build number:2.2.0.v200706111025

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report in bug #181130
2. Preview

Expected result:
Provide friendly error information.

Actual result:
Error running the report with NPE

Error log:

This report file is produced by an old versoin of Birt. The measures in the report have no datatype information which will cause a NPE. In the latest version this problem does not exist. Most of measure datatypes is number type. So giving a default datatype "Decimal" can make most of these kind of report file work.
Set default value of the measure data type is 'decimal' since the function is 'sum' by default.

Verify in build 2.2.0.v20070613.
Model will add a default datatype decimal for cube measure, this only for xtab created in 2.2 M6 build.
